abstract: Hillary Clinton's advisers insist Bill Clinton will not unduly influence her if she wins presidency, assuring voters that former president will not look over shoulder of sitting one; aides' precautions, however, avoid Bill Clinton's history of getting into trouble when not occupied and difficult question of how best to utilize him in new role.
lead_paragraph: Clinton aides are addressing a potentially thorny problem: Historically, when Mr. Clinton has time on his hands, he can create dangerous distractions for his wife.

headline.main: A Worry if Hillary Clinton Wins: What to Do With Bill
headline.print_headline: If Clinton Wins, a Concern: Occupying the First Spouse

snippet: Clinton aides are addressing a potentially thorny problem: Historically, when Mr. Clinton has time on his hands, he can create dangerous distractions for his wife....
